lines.text: You dirty, no good, backslidin' sidewinder! Try to cheat me will you?
Sentinel? I know people in Sentinel.
I hope you been getting letters from 'em regular. Last time they took a census, Boot Hill had quite a population.
Seems like nothing happens around here without your say-so.
Tell me, what do you do when it rains?
You're a big man, Mr. Sands. We're always polite to celebrities.

[after he kisses her]
By the way, what's your name?
